column8: Perhaps a song would be in order at this time?
Would you be interested in one of my songs?
What might I do for you, my friend?
Is there a song which you would like to hear?
How about a little song, is that all right?
I am your humble court musician, Zagreus.
Things might appear a little brighter with a song...!
All right I like that one!
I thought you might say that.
You like that one, do you?
Why, I don't see why not!
Thank you. I shall... I shall.
This makes me think of her.
I know no other way, my friend.
It's almost everything to me, my friend.
That makes it difficult to sing, my friend.
I resolved never to fight, my friend.
I fight only through song, my friend.
I am attempting here to sing, my friend!
I shall give it some thought, I think.
